alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 03 at 3:09AM CDT until September 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Prolonged heat. Afternoon index values of 95 to 100 degrees expected through Tuesday. Overnight lows will only fall into the low to mid-70s. * WHERE...Jackson and Monroe Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CDT Tuesday with the greatest impacts during the afternoon hours each day. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Humidity values today through Monday will be on the lower side, but do increase for Tuesday.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you spend time outside. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
